channel.title: Need help with shops
channel.description:
Ok i get this when i run my server:
[code]starting server on 0 0 0 0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.numberformat Exception: for input string: "7 8 @gre@barrows shop at java.lang number exception.forinputString<numberformatException_ java:38> at java.lang.interger.parselnt<integer.java:456> at java.lang.interger.parselnt<integer.java:497> at shophandler.loadshops<shophandler.java:115> at shophandler.<init><shophandler.java:30> at server.main <server.java:29>[/code]
and then its just a black screen and also heres my shop code i just added
[code]shop = 78 @gre@Barrows shop 1 1 4716 100 4718 100 4720 100 4722 100 4724 100 4726 100 4728 100 4730 100 4732 100 4734 100 4736 100 4738 100 4740 1000000 4745 100 4747 100 4749 100 4751 100 4753 100 4755 100 4757 100 4759 100 4708 100 4710 100 4712 100 4714 100[/code]
Hers my autospawn for npc [code]//Part of shops spawn = 206 2609 3094 0 2609 3094 2609 3094 0 Dwarf[/code]
herse my wanneshop in client.java'
[code]else if (NPCID == 206) { // Dwarf PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 78; }[/code]
any one kno the reason? thanks =]

item.title: Need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I can’t see anything wrong with those either, so no.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with shops
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

No no, you should be using tabs, not spacebar, so don’t worry about that. Haha, Brendan’s an awesome name eh? Seems to pop up alot now-a-days.

I can’t see anything wrong with it, sorry. Maybe you should re-do it?

Read full topic
